00083 
00084 void dtrsmSC(char side, char uplo, char transa, char diag,
00085                      int m, int n,
00086                      double alpha, double *a, int lda,
00087              double *b, int ldb)
00088 {
00089   int flagSideisL = 0, flagUploisL = 0, flagTransAisN = 0;
00090   if((side=='l') || (side=='L')) flagSideisL=1;
00091   if((uplo=='l') || (uplo=='L')) flagUploisL=1;
00092   if((transa=='n') || (transa=='N')) flagTransAisN=1;
00093 
00094   if((flagSideisL && flagUploisL && flagTransAisN) ||
00095          (flagSideisL && !flagUploisL && !flagTransAisN) ||
00096          (!flagSideisL && !flagUploisL && flagTransAisN) ||
00097      (!flagSideisL && flagUploisL && !flagTransAisN))
00098   {
00099     dtrsmLower(side, uplo, transa, diag, m, n, alpha,
00100                         a, lda, b, ldb);
00101   }
00102   else
00103   {
00104     dtrsmUpper(side, uplo, transa, diag, m, n, alpha,
00105                         a, lda, b, ldb);
00106   }
00107 }
